product_name: ExOfficio Chipara Sun Hat - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With UPF 50+ protection and a crushable material, the ExOfficio Chipara(TM) Sun Hat will go everywhere you do this summer. Crushable polyester fabric packs away easily and snaps back to shape when you put the hat on. 2.5 in. wide flexible brim shades your face from the sun. Closeout.
short_description: With UPF 50+ protection and a crushable material, the ExOfficio Chipara(TM) Sun Hat will go everywhere you do this summer.
